name: Cycloid (FearCode)
description:
Nonsense vintage stupid game, playing this will make you shoot balls, literally. 
You are a ball that catch balls and shoot at balls.
It takes around 20 minutes to finish the Quest Mode and 2 hours to completely beat the game with all unlockables:

  • 2 Additional Quest Modes
  • 3 Extra Balls to shoot
  • A new option in arcade mode
  • 3 Secret Bosses 
  • They are all Free unlockables already in the game, no freemium bullcr*p here.

You can also play with your buddy, offline though.

This is a 15 years old game with MIDI music done by me, trashy  but I put love into it all, so enjoy.

If you want a spoiler on how to unlock anything specificallly just ask in the comment section, Thanks for playing. 

Extra development info: The game was created in 2008 (even older than itch.io). I rebuilt it recently but using the same tools. - The music was fully done by me and I didn't know much about composition, so don't hate me please. - The game was developed using C++ and allegro (no engine behind) - All art except fonts and BG images were done by me procedurally. - The game is hard to beat with all unlockables, make sure you do combos to get better scores to unlock extras modes.
